Service • landing page

Landing Page (Ads & Campaigns)

A conversion-first landing page for ads and campaigns—fast, focused, and tracking-ready.

Request a quoteContact
Timeline: 5–10 days

What you get

Deliverables

  • One-page conversion funnel
  • Tracking-ready (GA4 / Pixel)
  • Fast load + clean SEO signals

Outcomes

  • Higher CTR-to-lead
  • Lower bounce on paid traffic
  • Clear A/B test foundation

How it will be delivered

  1. 1Message & offer mapping
  2. 2Design + copy draft
  3. 3Build + QA + launch

What I need from you

  • Your offer + target audience (one clear goal)
  • Brand assets (logo/colors) if available
  • Any existing copy or references you like
  • A contact method (WhatsApp / email / form)

FAQ

Is copywriting included?

Yes—light copy polish is included. If you have a draft, we refine it for clarity and conversion.

Will it be fast on mobile?

Yes. Performance and clean UI are part of the delivery, with attention to LCP and layout stability.

Can we track conversions?

We can wire tracking events if you provide the tools (GA/GTM or platform).

Ready to start?

Send project type, goal, number of pages, and target date. I will reply with a clear plan and quote.
